about_me.des: I am a fifth-year student of computer engineering. Work experience in server and LAN management, specially in GNU/Linux environment, frontend web development and trying to learn web development in open source platforms, specially Django, Laravel, VueJS, etc.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It's pretty minimal, but leverages large type and drastic contrast to make a statement, on all devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.

career.ineter_des: At INETER, I learned to manage and configure servers most GNU/Linux as well as technical knowledge of LAN networks, services and network management protocols. I also improved my skills develop scripts for automating local and remote tasks. All this in both physical and virtualized environments. Here I met one of the largest artwork in the computer world ... IPTABLES
career.mentoring_des: After half and a year, I worked in INETER once again, this time for an research job about posibilities to use embedded computers like RaspberryPi and TS7260 in some specific task for telemetry
career.laravel_des: As college proyect for a class, my workgroup started developing a Laravel aplication.This is my first try as backend in a project, I did migrations, models and some server administration in the hosting Azure VM
career.accedo_des: Working as Web Designer, I made a lot of sites's layout using HTML5, CSS3 y Bootstrap3
career.efficientix_des: I started working remotely as Frontend Developer with VueJS, later I started collaborating with backend roles in some new proyects
